description: Got too many peaches? Freeze them for later, and then blend them up with coconut milk and a hint of cinnamon to make these peaches and cream smoothie bowls.
keywords: peaches and cream smoothie bowls, smoothie bowl recipe, Summer Smoothie Bowl
name: Summer Smoothie Bowl
recipeIngredient: 2 cups chopped frozen peaches (about 2 small peaches)
1 cup light coconut milk (or full-fat, or your favorite non-dairy milk)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the frozen peaches, banana, coconut milk, maple syrup, vanilla, and cinnamon into a blender and blend until smooth and creamy, stopping to scrape down the inside of the pitcher as needed. Taste test and add more maple syrup if you'd like.
Divide the mixture among 2 bowls. Top with raspberries, peach slices, and almonds. Drizzle with almond butter. Serve.
